#{colDescription}, #{bookName}, #{project}, #{year}, #{location}, #{seq}, #{plotNumber}, #{plotNumberName}, #{pedid}, #{pedigree}, #{pedigree2}, #{pedigreesource1}, #{pedigreesource2}, #{femalePedid}, mapper.delete:
delete from phenotype where pedId in
#{pedid}
mapper.select:
select * from phenotype where 1=1 and year in
#{year}

select * from phenotype where 1=1 and location in
#{location}
select * from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree}
select * from phenotype
select distinct year from phenotype
select distinct location from phenotype
select COLUMN_NAME from information_schema.`COLUMNS` where table_name='phenotype' and table_schema='zeamap'

select pedid,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,grain_length,grain_width,ear_length,ear_diameter,kernel_row_number,kernel_numbers_per_row,grain_weight,yield,kernel_numbers_per_ear,ear_kernel_weight,grain_water_content,kernel_percentage from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree} and grain_length is not null and grain_width is not null and ear_length is not null and ear_diameter is not null and kernel_row_number is not null and kernel_numbers_per_row is not null and grain_weight is not null and yield is not null and kernel_numbers_per_ear is not null and ear_kernel_weight is not null and grain_water_content is not null and kernel_percentage is not null

select pedid,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,grain_length,grain_width,ear_length,ear_diameter,kernel_row_number,kernel_numbers_per_row,grain_weight,yield,kernel_numbers_per_ear,ear_kernel_weight,grain_water_content,kernel_percentage from phenotype where grain_length is not null and grain_width is not null and ear_length is not null and ear_diameter is not null and kernel_row_number is not null and kernel_numbers_per_row is not null and grain_weight is not null and yield is not null and kernel_numbers_per_ear is not null and ear_kernel_weight is not null and grain_water_content is not null and kernel_percentage is not null

SELECT pedid,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,leaf_length,leaf_width,plant_height, ear_height, tassel_length_top, tassel_branch_number1, `expression`, tassel_branch_number, rates, leaf_number_above_ear, seedling_potential, tassel_length_2, tassel_posture_2, tassel_angle_2, tassel_length_3, tassel_length_4, tassel_density, tassel_weight1, tassel_weight2, tassel_floret_number, pollen_quantity, root_distribution, root_layer, root_thickness, root_angle, female_root_distribution, male_root_distribution, leaf_shape_1, leaf_posture1, leaf_angle, leaf_posture2, leaf_number1, stem_diameter, ear_bearing_posture, husk_tier, husk_thickness1, husk_tier_all, husk_thickness2, silk_color, anther_color, stem_root_color, rachis_color, sheath_color1, glume_color, leaf_color1, grain_color2, grain_color, sheath_color2, leaf_color2 FROM phenotype WHERE pedigree=#{pedigree}

SELECT pedid,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location, leaf_length, leaf_width, plant_height, ear_height, tassel_branch_number, root_layer, leaf_number1, stem_diameter, silk_color, anther_color, rachis_color, grain_color FROM phenotype WHERE leaf_length IS NOT NULL AND leaf_width IS NOT NULL AND plant_height IS NOT NULL AND ear_height IS NOT NULL AND tassel_length_top IS NOT NULL AND tassel_branch_number1 IS NOT NULL AND `expression` IS NOT NULL AND tassel_branch_number IS NOT NULL AND rates IS NOT NULL AND leaf_number_above_ear IS NOT NULL AND seedling_potential IS NOT NULL AND tassel_length_2 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_posture_2 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_angle_2 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_length_3 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_length_4 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_density IS NOT NULL AND tassel_weight1 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_weight2 IS NOT NULL AND tassel_floret_number IS NOT NULL AND pollen_quantity IS NOT NULL AND root_distribution IS NOT NULL AND root_layer IS NOT NULL AND root_thickness IS NOT NULL AND root_angle IS NOT NULL AND female_root_distribution IS NOT NULL AND male_root_distribution IS NOT NULL AND leaf_shape_1 IS NOT NULL AND leaf_posture1 IS NOT NULL AND leaf_angle IS NOT NULL AND leaf_posture2 IS NOT NULL AND leaf_number1 IS NOT NULL AND stem_diameter IS NOT NULL AND ear_bearing_posture IS NOT NULL AND husk_tier IS NOT NULL AND husk_thickness1 IS NOT NULL AND husk_tier_all IS NOT NULL AND husk_thickness2 IS NOT NULL

select pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,field_evaluation,field_evaluation2,laboratory_evaluation,laboratory_evaluation2,benefitial,empty_stalk_number,selected_plant_number,plant_number,leaf_stay_green,pollination_plan1,pollination_plan2,double_ear_number,decision_strip,decision_source,site_discrepancy,tests1,tests2,anther_tassel_interval from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree}

select pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,field_evaluation,field_evaluation2,laboratory_evaluation,laboratory_evaluation2,benefitial,empty_stalk_number,selected_plant_number,plant_number,leaf_stay_green,pollination_plan1,pollination_plan2,double_ear_number,decision_strip,decision_source,site_discrepancy,tests1,tests2,anther_tassel_interval from phenotype where empty_stalk_number is not null and selected_plant_number is not null and plant_number is not null and double_ear_number is not null and anther_tassel_interval is not null

select days_to_tassel,days_to_seedling,days_to_maturity,date_planted,growth_period,days_to_anther,days_to_silk,date_harvested from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree} and days_to_tassel is not null and days_to_seedling is not null and days_to_maturity is not null and date_planted is not null and growth_period is not null and days_to_anther is not null and days_to_silk is not null and date_harvested is not null

select days_to_tassel,days_to_seedling,days_to_maturity,date_planted,growth_period,days_to_anther,days_to_silk,date_harvested from phenotype where days_to_tassel is not null and days_to_seedling is not null and days_to_maturity is not null and date_planted is not null and growth_period is not null and days_to_anther is not null and days_to_silk is not null and date_harvested is not null
select pedigree,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2 from phenotype where pedigree is not null;
select ${trait} from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree} and ${trait} is not null
select pedigree,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2 from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree}
select ${trait} from phenotype where pedigree is not null
select pedigree,year,location,${trait} from phenotype where pedigree is not null
select ${trait},year,location from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree} and pedigree is not null GROUP BY ${trait},year,location
select year,location,${trait} from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree} group by year,location,${trait}

select ustilago_maydis,maize_ear_rot,maize_sheath_blight,southern_corn_rust,leaf_spot_disease,maize_borer,northern_leaf_blight,comprehensive_resistance from phenotype where pedigree=#{pedigree} and ustilago_maydis is not null and maize_ear_rot is not null and maize_sheath_blight is not null and southern_corn_rust is not null and leaf_spot_disease is not null and maize_borer is not null and northern_leaf_blight is not null and comprehensive_resistance is not null

select ustilago_maydis,maize_ear_rot,maize_sheath_blight,southern_corn_rust,leaf_spot_disease,maize_borer,northern_leaf_blight,comprehensive_resistance from phenotype where ustilago_maydis is not null and maize_ear_rot is not null and maize_sheath_blight is not null and southern_corn_rust is not null and leaf_spot_disease is not null and maize_borer is not null and northern_leaf_blight is not null and comprehensive_resistance is not null

select pedid,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location, leaf_length, leaf_width, plant_height, ear_height, tassel_length_top, tassel_branch_number1, `expression`, tassel_branch_number, glume_color, leaf_color1, grain_color2, grain_color, sheath_color2, leaf_color2 FROM phenotype where leaf_length IS NOT NULL AND leaf_width IS NOT NULL AND plant_height IS NOT NULL AND ear_height IS select pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,field_evaluation,field_evaluation2,laboratory_evaluation,laboratory_evaluation2,benefitial,empty_stalk_number,selected_plant_number,plant_number,leaf_stay_green,pollination_plan1,pollination_plan2,double_ear_number,decision_strip,decision_source,site_discrepancy,tests1,tests2,anther_tassel_interval from phenotype where empty_stalk_number is not null and selected_plant_number is not null and plant_number is not null and double_ear_number is not null and anther_tassel_interval is not null

select pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,root_lodging, lodging_resistance, stem_lodging, seedling_death_percent1, dead_seedling_number1, seedling_death_percent2, dead_seedling_number2, seedling_death_percent3, dead_seedling_number3, treat_name, deformed_seedling_percent, deformed_seedling_number from phenotype

select pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,ustilago_maydis maize_ear_rot, maize_sheath_blight, southern_corn_rust, leaf_spot_disease, maize_borer, maize_stalk_rot, maize_rough_dwarf_disease, southern_corn_rust_txt, northern_leaf_blight, maize_dwarf_mosaic_disease, maize_albinism, physoderma_maydis, gray_leaf_spot, ear_kernel_rot, southern_leaf_blight, graminearum_stalk_rot, pythium_stalk_rot, F_graminEarum, F_verticillioides, aphis, borer_resistance, treatments_applied, resistance_characters1, resistance_characters2, resistance_characters3, comprehensive_resistance from phenotype

select year,field_evaluation,field_evaluation2,laboratory_evaluation,laboratory_evaluation2,benefitial,empty_stalk_number,selected_plant_number,plant_number,leaf_stay_green,pollination_plan1,pollination_plan2,double_ear_number,decision_strip,decision_source,site_discrepancy,tests1,tests2,anther_tassel_interval from phenotype group by year,field_evaluation,field_evaluation2,laboratory_evaluation,laboratory_evaluation2,benefitial,empty_stalk_number,selected_plant_number,plant_number,leaf_stay_green,pollination_plan1,pollination_plan2,double_ear_number,decision_strip,decision_source,site_discrepancy,tests1,tests2,anther_tassel_interval

select year,root_lodging, lodging_resistance, stem_lodging, seedling_death_percent1, dead_seedling_number1, seedling_death_percent2, dead_seedling_number2, seedling_death_percent3, dead_seedling_number3, treat_name, deformed_seedling_percent, deformed_seedling_number from phenotype group by year,root_lodging, lodging_resistance, stem_lodging, seedling_death_percent1, dead_seedling_number1, seedling_death_percent2, dead_seedling_number2, seedling_death_percent3, dead_seedling_number3, treat_name, deformed_seedling_percent, deformed_seedling_number

select year,ustilago_maydis, maize_ear_rot, maize_sheath_blight, southern_corn_rust, leaf_spot_disease, maize_borer, maize_stalk_rot, maize_rough_dwarf_disease, southern_corn_rust_txt, northern_leaf_blight, maize_dwarf_mosaic_disease, maize_albinism, physoderma_maydis, gray_leaf_spot, ear_kernel_rot, southern_leaf_blight, graminearum_stalk_rot, pythium_stalk_rot, F_graminEarum, F_verticillioides, aphis, borer_resistance, treatments_applied, resistance_characters1, resistance_characters2, resistance_characters3, comprehensive_resistance from phenotype group by year,ustilago_maydis, maize_ear_rot, maize_sheath_blight, southern_corn_rust, leaf_spot_disease, maize_borer, maize_stalk_rot, maize_rough_dwarf_disease, southern_corn_rust_txt, northern_leaf_blight, maize_dwarf_mosaic_disease, maize_albinism, physoderma_maydis, gray_leaf_spot, ear_kernel_rot, southern_leaf_blight, graminearum_stalk_rot, pythium_stalk_rot, F_graminEarum, F_verticillioides, aphis, borer_resistance, treatments_applied, resistance_characters1, resistance_characters2, resistance_characters3, comprehensive_resistance

select year,leaf_length, leaf_width, plant_height, ear_height, tassel_length_top, tassel_branch_number1, `expression`, tassel_branch_number, rates, leaf_number_above_ear, seedling_potential, tassel_length_2, tassel_posture_2, tassel_angle_2, tassel_length_3, tassel_length_4, tassel_density, tassel_weight1, tassel_weight2, tassel_floret_number, pollen_quantity, root_distribution, root_layer, root_thickness, root_angle, female_root_distribution, male_root_distribution, leaf_shape_1, leaf_posture1, leaf_angle, leaf_posture2, leaf_number1, stem_diameter, ear_bearing_posture, husk_tier, husk_thickness1, husk_tier_all, husk_thickness2, silk_color, anther_color, stem_root_color, rachis_color, sheath_color1, glume_color, leaf_color1, grain_color2, grain_color, sheath_color2, leaf_color2 from phenotype group by year,leaf_length, leaf_width, plant_height, ear_height, tassel_length_top, tassel_branch_number1, `expression`, tassel_branch_number, rates, leaf_number_above_ear, seedling_potential, tassel_length_2, tassel_posture_2, tassel_angle_2, tassel_length_3, tassel_length_4, tassel_density, tassel_weight1, tassel_weight2, tassel_floret_number, pollen_quantity, root_distribution, root_layer, root_thickness, root_angle, female_root_distribution, male_root_distribution, leaf_shape_1, leaf_posture1, leaf_angle, leaf_posture2, leaf_number1, stem_diameter, ear_bearing_posture, husk_tier, husk_thickness1, husk_tier_all, husk_thickness2, silk_color, anther_color, stem_root_color, rachis_color, sheath_color1, glume_color, leaf_color1, grain_color2, grain_color, sheath_color2, leaf_color2
select count(*) from as_trait_type where trait_type_id in (select trait_type_id from trait_type where trait_type_name=#{traitName})
select count(*) from phenotype

select pedid,pedigreeSource1,pedigreeSource2,pedigree,year,location,grain_length,grain_width,ear_length,ear_diameter,kernel_row_number,kernel_numbers_per_row,grain_weight,yield,kernel_numbers_per_ear,ear_kernel_weight,grain_water_content,kernel_percentage from phenotype

select year,grain_length,grain_width,ear_length,ear_diameter,kernel_row_number,kernel_numbers_per_row,grain_weight,yield,kernel_numbers_per_ear,ear_kernel_weight,grain_water_content,kernel_percentage from phenotype group by year,grain_length,grain_width,ear_length,ear_diameter,kernel_row_number,kernel_numbers_per_row,grain_weight,yield,kernel_numbers_per_ear,ear_kernel_weight,grain_water_content,kernel_percentage
select distinct pedigree from phenotype
